short.ar: اختر سيارتك المناسبة وانحرف على طول الطريق بالسيارة.
short.am: ተስማሚ መኪናህን ምረጥና ከመኪናው ጋር መንገድ ላይ ተጓዝ።
short.bg: Изберете подходящия си автомобил и се носите по пътя с колата.
short.bn: আপনার উপযুক্ত গাড়ী চয়ন করুন এবং গাড়ী সঙ্গে রাস্তা বরাবর ড্রিফট।
short.ca: Tria el teu vehicle adequat i mou-te per la carretera amb el cotxe.
short.cs: Vyberte si vhodné vozidlo a driftujte s vozem po silnici.
short.da: Vælg dit passende køretøj og kør langs vejen med bilen.
short.de: Wählen Sie Ihr passendes Fahrzeug und treiben Sie mit dem Auto die Straße entlang.
short.el: Επιλέξτε το κατάλληλο όχημα και παρασυρθείτε κατά μήκος του δρόμου με το αυτοκίνητο.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,pt_BR,pt_: Choose your suitable vehicle and drift along the road with the car.
short.es: Elija su vehículo adecuado y derrape a lo largo de la carretera con el automóvil.
short.et: Valige sobiv sõiduk ja triivige autoga mööda teed.
short.fa: وسیله نقلیه مناسب خود را انتخاب کنید و رانش در طول جاده با ماشین.
short.fi: Valitse sopiva ajoneuvosi ja ajaudu tietä pitkin auton kanssa.
short.fil: Piliin ang iyong angkop na sasakyan at tuyo kasama ang kalsada sa kotse.
short.fr: Choisissez votre véhicule approprié et dérivez le long de la route avec la voiture.
short.gu: તમારું યોગ્ય વાહન પસંદ કરો અને કારની સાથે રસ્તા પર જાઓ.
short.he: בחר את הרכב המתאים שלך ונסחף לאורך הכביש עם המכונית.
short.hi: अपने उपयुक्त वाहन चुनें और कार के साथ सड़क के साथ बहाव।
short.hr: Odaberite svoje prikladno vozilo i zalutajte cestom s automobilom.
short.hu: Válassza ki a megfelelő járművet, és sodródjon az úton az autóval.
short.id: Pilih kendaraan yang sesuai dan hanyut di sepanjang jalan dengan mobil.
short.it: Scegli il tuo veicolo adatto e vai alla deriva lungo la strada con l'auto.
short.ja: あなたの適切な車を選択し、車と一緒に道路に沿ってドリフト。
short.kn: ನಿಮ್ಮ ಸೂಕ್ತವಾದ ವಾಹನವನ್ನು ಆಯ್ಕೆ ಮಾಡಿ ಮತ್ತು ಕಾರಿನೊಂದಿಗೆ ರಸ್ತೆಯುದ್ದಕ್ಕೂ ಚಲಿಸಿ.
short.ko: 적합한 차량을 선택하고 자동차와 함께 도로를 따라 표류하십시오.
short.lv: Izvēlieties piemērotu transportlīdzekli un ar automašīnu dreifējiet pa ceļu.
short.ml: നിങ്ങളുടെ അനുയോജ്യമായ വാഹനം തിരഞ്ഞെടുക്കുക, കാറിനൊപ്പം റോഡിലൂടെ ഡ്രിഫ്റ്റ് ചെയ്യുക.
short.mr: आपले योग्य वाहन निवडा आणि कारसह रस्त्याने वाहून जा.
short.ms: Pilih kenderaan anda yang sesuai dan hanyut di sepanjang jalan dengan kereta.
short.nl: Kies uw geschikte voertuig en drift met de auto over de weg.
short.no: Velg ditt passende kjøretøy og driv langs veien med bilen.
short.pl: Wybierz odpowiedni pojazd i dryfuj po drodze z samochodem.
short.ro: Alegeți vehiculul potrivit și deplasați-vă de-a lungul drumului cu mașina.
short.ru: Выберите подходящее транспортное средство и дрейфуйте по дороге вместе с автомобилем.
short.sk: Vyberte si vhodné vozidlo a driftujte sa po ceste s autom.
short.sl: Izberite svoje primerno vozilo in se vozite po cesti z avtomobilom.
short.sv: Välj ditt lämpliga fordon och kör längs vägen med bilen.
short.sw: Chagua gari lako linalofaa na uende kando ya barabara na gari.
short.ta: உங்கள் பொருத்தமான வாகனத்தைத் தேர்ந்தெடுத்து, காருடன் சாலையில் சறுக்கவும்.
short.te: మీకు తగిన వాహనాన్ని ఎంచుకోండి మరియు కారుతోపాటుగా రోడ్డు వెంబడి డ్రిఫ్ట్ చేయండి.
short.th: เลือกรถที่เหมาะสมของคุณและล่องลอยไปตามถนนด้วยรถ
short.tr: Uygun aracınızı seçin ve araba ile yol boyunca sürüklenin.
short.uk: Виберіть відповідний вам транспортний засіб і дрейфуйте вздовж дороги з автомобілем.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fa,fi,f:
Get ready for a realistic car game. Choose the car you want, start the fun in the scene you want. Drift boss players can customize by choosing one of six different racing cars. As a customization option, drift car color, smoke color, and wheel options are available. Drift max players can drift on five tracks after customizing their racing cars. The first track is unlocked, and the other tracks will be unlocked when the levels are completed. To open the locks, you must score high on the drift tracks with race cars and reach the finish line. You can customize your racing cars with the rewards you earn while drifting at high speed. It is possible for users who love car driving simulator and drifting to enjoy this drift boss game more. 

How To Play
While using the arrow keys to drift with the race cars, you can also use the space key to slide your car on the track. The important detail you need to pay attention to while drifting is not hitting the areas on the track to show that you are an excellent drift boss. If you have an accident while sliding with a drift car, your drift score will be deleted, and you will fail in this drifting game.

Extreme Drift Car Game Features
✓ Realistic shader
✓ 3+ Level
✓ 5+ Car
✓ Advanced control
✓ 3D environment

Finally, you can enjoy these game for free (and more requests will be added)! Extreme Drift Car Game extension does not contain any hidden ads.

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@gamebol.com and share your thoughts and problems.
